Class MainContent

java.lang.Object
com.project.ui.MainContent
@Component public class MainContent extends Object
The MainContent class represents the main content area of the application. It is a Spring-managed component that encapsulates a JavaFX StackPane to display dynamic content, such as a TableView.

The default content is a text message prompting the user to select a tab from the left sidebar. The class provides methods to update the displayed content with a new TableView and to scroll to the bottom of the table.

Annotations used:

  • @Component indicates that this class is a Spring component.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainContent

      public MainContent()
      Constructs a new MainContent instance. Initializes the view with default styling and a default message prompting the user to select a tab from the left sidebar.

  • Method Details

    • updateContent

      public <T> void updateContent(javafx.scene.control.TableView<T> tableView)
      Updates the main content area with the specified TableView. Clears any existing content in the view and displays the new table view.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of items contained in the TableView
      Parameters:
      tableView - the new TableView to be displayed

    • scrollToBottom

      public <T> void scrollToBottom()
      Scrolls to the bottom of the currently displayed TableView. This method scrolls the table view to the last item in the list.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of items contained in the TableView
